TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113c: Measures of this type implemented in previous cycle, no new measures nor significant changes planned
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113d: There are safeguard zones and there are no plans to change the regulations as a result of this RBMP.
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113eThreshold: Yes, small abstractions are exempted from controls
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113eImpoundment: Yes, there is a concession, authorisation and/or permitting regime to control water impoundment and a register of impoundments
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113f: Measures of this type implemented in previous cycle, no new measures nor significant changes planned
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113gThreshold: Yes, small discharges are exempted from controls
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113hRules: Yes, but there are differentiated rules for different parts of the RBDs.
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113j: Some direct discharges are authorised in accordance with Article 11.3.j
TargetedQ.ecologicalFlow: Yes, ecological flows have been derived for all relevant water bodies
TargetedQ.ecologicalFlowImplementation: Yes, ecological flows which have been derived have been implemented in all relevant water bodies
TargetedQ.climateChangeAspectsConsidered: Assessing direct and indirect climate pressures
Maximisation of cross-sectoral benefits and minimisation of negative effects across sectors

otherAspectsReference.wfd:subject: Climate changes in the second RBMP and PoM
objectives and requirements of the Floods Directive in the second RBMP and PoM
taken into account of the relevant measures being planned for the first PoM for the Marine Strategy Framework Directive
otherAspectsReference.wfd:documentName: Instruction du Gouvernement du 17 février 2014 relative à l’articulation entre la DCE et la DCSMM

Progress.improvementInStatusGeneral: Less than described in the RBMP

Progress.improvementsInStatusChemicalSWB: Less than described in the RBMP
Progress.improvementsInStatusQuantitativeGWB: Less than described in the RBMP
Progress.improvementsInStatusChemicalGWB: Less than described in the RBMP
